pages.text: Animals in the vicinity of the ritual will magically shed items as though they had been slain by a player, but without suffering any harm.$(br2)$(info) Any animal who is affected by the ritual will briefly glow.$(br2)$(info) A level of looting is applied to all kills, increasing the chances of obtaining rare drops.
$(standing_stones) As a $(bold)tier 3$() ritual, $(l:rituals/ritual_animal_harvest#multiblock)3 standing stones are required before the ritual can be begun$().
